general.text: The General section provides identifying information about the biomarker.
general.title: General

biomarker_description.text: The Biomarker Description section describes the measured change of the biomarker entity within a specific tissue and disease.
biomarker_description.title: Biomarker Description

components.text: The Components section contains glycan and protein accessions associated with the biomarker.
components.title: Components

cross_references.text: The Cross References section provides a list of database entries and links for the biomarker in other databases.
cross_references.title: Cross References

publications.text: The Publications section contains publications where the given biomarker was reported.
publications.title: Publications
